text: avane badhicca vipatt vittealinnasesam nam'mute anugraham namavane asvadippiccal tirccayayum avan parayum: "it enikk avakasappettatutanneyan. antyasamayam asannamakumenn nan karutunnilla. athava, nanenre nathanre atuttekk tiriccayakkappettalum enikk avanreyatutt nalla avasthayanuntavuka." ennal ittaram satyanisedhikalkk avar pravartticcukeantirunnatinepparri nam vivaramariyikkum. kathinamaya siksa avare asvadippikkum
